Package math

Class Vec4

  • java.lang.Object
    • math.Vec4

extends java.lang.Object
    4-dimensional vector operations

      Vec4 max​(Vec4 vec)
      Returns a vector containing the component-wise maxima

      v1 = [0, 5, 1, 1]
      v2 = [3, 0, 2, -2]

      v1.max( v2 ) = [3, 5, 2, 1]
      static Vec4 max​(Vec4 left, Vec4 right)
      Returns a new vector containing the component-wise maxima
      v1 = [0, 5, 1, 1]
      v2 = [3, 0, 2, -2]

      max( v1, v2 ) = [3, 5, 2, 1]

      Returns a vector containing the component-wise minima

      v2 = [3, 0, 2, -2]

      v1.min( v2 ) = [0, 0, 1, -2]

        public Vec4 mix​(Vec4 vec,
                float alpha)
        Linear, component-wise interpolation between the two vectors.
        Returns:
        alpha*this + (1-alpha) * vec
